title: Okay GD, lets have some fun. Ask me how I feel about any GDer, nobody is off limits.
body:
I will be 100% honest as long as I know who they are and recognize them on here. But do not ask me about yourself, I don't want to know how curious you are about my feelings regarding you, I want to know who you are thinking about and my feelings on that person.

Its no holds barred, 100% real here son. Ask away.
